features: 【Multiple Light Modes】- 3 Colour modes together with 5 brightness levels, this desk lamp is suitable for different needs, like bright daylight white light for home office and soft warm light for bedside.
【Eye-caring LED Desk Lamp】- 96 Energy efficient LEDs provide natural and non-glaring light to avoid eye fatigue. Ideal for working, reading and studying for a long time.

【Sensitive Touch Control】- All modes are controlled by a slight touch. Memory function will remember your favorite setting and automatically return to it when turned on the dimmable desk lamp next time.
【Stable & Adjustable】- Flexible lamp head and arm are easily adjustable to direct the light wherever you need it the most. When not being used, this office table lamp can be folded to save room.
【What You Get】- Lepro LED Desk Lamp, 1.5-meter long power cord with CE certified UK standard power adaptor and user manual.
body.description: Stylish Metal Desk Lamp Makes All the Difference in the Home Office or Study Desk Functionally Protect Your Eyes 550 lm bright light is sufficient for precision work. No more eye strain trying to see small details.Customize the lighting hue and brightness. Choose the soft glow that is gentle on the eyes for late night readingCast stable, non-flickering lightDiffused light, no hash glare.Even light distribution. no shadow spots.CRI is 85 Ra, it can reveal the true colors of your workspace make you feel more comfortable. Trendy Modern Look with Thoughtful Design Durable metal frame, solid in construction and neatly built. Lightweight aluminum lamp with weighted base. It's well balanced so it does not tip over. The lamp is a fresh looking all white color. It has the same sort of aesthetic with Alexa gadgets and it matches with Apple products nicely. Unlike those shiny glossy plastic lamps, fingerprints are less visible on this metal lamp with anti-scratch matte lacquer finish It won’t get yellow with age. The base coated with EVA anti-slip foam mat help prevent scratching the surfaces and keep it stay in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the Studio's Desk
reviews.reviewText: What a great lamp this is! Sleek design and takes up very little room with warm and cool light settings as well as dimming for each. Perfect for my needs and very affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Different levels of light, great for a small workspace!
reviews.reviewText: Love how thin it is and works great in a small space. Has multiple lighting levels and easy touch on/off. Perfect for my crafting table!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect lamp and good addition to my workplace
reviews.reviewText: The LED desk lamp with touchable and dimmable control is a practical and stylish lighting solution. The touch-sensitive interface makes it easy to adjust brightness levels with a simple touch. The dimmable feature adds versatility, allowing for personalized lighting preferences. Its sleek design and functional controls make it an excellent addition to any workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT FOR CRAFTS
reviews.reviewText: I use my Cricut and I need a big bright light for when I am working on my vinyl and this is PERFECT! It is an amazing product and a crazy great price for!!! Highly recommend. It’s got LOTS of light brightness/darkness settings and with multiple light colors. Great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good light, good quality!
reviews.reviewText: No assembly required, good material quality, good illumination - purchased this light for my spouse to use throughout our home as needed - she loves it!!! Would definitely recommend it to family and friends as I, myself, have grabbed it up on several occasions. I like the illumination but also the fact that it can be used in many different angles since the light’s frame allow for different adjustments. Good for working in tight spots or hobbies, anything that need good lighting. Would definitely purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: I have this lamp on my computer desk. I love the choices for color of light, I like warm. You can also turn the brightness up and down. I wish the lamp was a little taller so I set it on some books. I didn't want to tilt the light arm up because I didn't want the light shining in my eyes. It is slim and doesn't take up much room. It's a perfect desk lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect puzzle light!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased as a Christmas gift for the mother in law who has everything! We do puzzles together during the winter months and the light set up was such a joke. Literally laughable! This has been perfect. Lights the tabletop perfectly. Huge improvement. Love the dimming switch as well as the warm or white light. The ability to manipulate it is amazing too! Slim and pleasing to the eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this lamp on the end table next to my bed. This is the second lamp I have bought so now we have two in the bedroom. The lighting is wonderful. Easy to adjust the direction of the light, increase it to your preference. I would highly recommend this lamp. Price was just right!

I'm so happy with my purchase. It is very lightweight, but stable. It has a modern, clean, and unobtrusive style. The touch controls are very nice. I like the three lighting choices and brightness control is great. I got the lamp on a black Friday deal and it was such a great price.

reviews.reviewTitle: This lamp does everything promised and is good quality.
reviews.reviewText: This desk lamp is very sleek and takes very little room. I use it to brighten up a corner that gets very little light but i have a few ornaments that i would like to be more visible. The dimmer switch is perfect for what i need. and would be really helpful over a computer ,or just a desk. Definitely worth the money..
Likes,: fits in anywhere easy to use wonderful light, would buy again

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice form factor, light weight, wobbles a bit, and does not dim very low.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice desk lamp that has a sleek contemporary look to it. The white colour works well with my white desktop and keyboard, and I like how easy the controls are to access and operate. I also like that it folds together so it would be easy, for example, to take the office if needed.There are two downsides: (1) the light does not dim very low, and (2) the lamp is not all that sturdy/stable. I have the lamp sitting on a side table beside my primary work surface and in that location it does not move much. However, it does wobble if I happen to move the side table, so I am sure it would move often if it was sitting on a main work surface.Also - although I cannot say this is a downside because I read this in the description and knew to expect this - the light itself does not turn from side to side. It would be great to have another model that offers this feature.I would say if you are looking for a sleek lamp that provides a normal-to-high amount of light, this would be a good choice. If, on the other hand, you are hoping for something that will give you a normal-to-low/ambient amount of light, I would look elsewhere.
Works well and I like the different light settings.
